goru.assign3

Class QuizApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • goru.assign3.QuizApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class QuizApp
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Launches a quiz for 6th graders by taking question from QuestionBank.
    Author:
    SwathiGoru
    See Also:
    QuestionBank, Question

      • getQuestion

        public goru.assign3.Question getQuestion(java.util.ArrayList<goru.assign3.Question> questions)
        This function returns a question from an ArrayList of questions
        Parameters:
        questions -
        Returns:
        a Question object

      • loadQuestions

        public void loadQuestions()
        Loads questions from the txt file and categorizes them according to the question topic. It also adds the questions to appropriate QuestionBank based on the topic. Runs a timer of 60 secs for each question.

      • timeOut

        public void timeOut()
        When the timer expires, the question is marked as attempted. The control moves on to the next question.

      • setupListeners

        public void setupListeners()
        Sets all the listeners for user actions on several UI components.

      • refreshErrorPanel

        public void refreshErrorPanel()
        When there are no more questions for display in a specified topic, this function is used to refresh the panel and notifies the user.

      • refreshPanel

        public void refreshPanel(goru.assign3.Question q)
        This function populates the panel with the information for the question related UI fields.
        Parameters:
        q - Question object

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Specifies all the actions to be performed for the listeners in setupListeners()
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
        See Also:
        setupListeners, submitAnswer, nextQuestion, selectTopic, displayResult

      • checkAnswer

        public void checkAnswer(java.lang.String ans)
        This function verifies the correct answer vs. the user given answer for a specific question. It updates the scores and questions attempted by the user.
        Parameters:
        ans -

      • selectTopic

        public void selectTopic(boolean next)
        This function selects a question for the given topic.
        Parameters:
        next - flag for next Question

      • submitAnswer

        public void submitAnswer()
        Based on the type of question, this function calls in checkAnswer.
        See Also:
        checkAnswer

      • nextQuestion

        public void nextQuestion()
        Selects the next question
